section.p: You struggle deeper into the forest until you come to a thick wall of impenetrable thorn bushes. Circling it, you find there is a break in the hedge, but it is filled by a large tree.
To your surprise, a face forms in the trunk, and speaks in a woody voice, ‘None can pass - begone, human!’

If you have the codeword Apple, .
If not, you can:

choices.choice: Try to persuade it to let you pass
